Clooney promotesHail, Caesar!

Channing Tatum dancing in a sailor suit and Scarlett Johansson taking a dip: two good reasons go see the Coen brothers’ new movie Hail, Caesar! At least according to George Clooney, making a playful pitch for the film at its premiere in Los Angeles.

The Hollywood hearthrob stars in the comedy set in 1950s Hollywood alongside Tatum and Johansson, along with Jonah Hill, Tilda Swinton and Josh Brolin also among the high-profile cast.

Clooney, who attended the screening with his wife Amal, is an old friend and of Joel and Ethan Coen. — AFP
title: Los Angeles, Feb 2, 2016 (AFP)
